channel.title: [Member Items]How Do I Make Items Member Only?[Member Items]
channel.description:
Erm... k well i made a site for my server but no-ones going on it, i dont blame em u get near to nothing out of it except membership, but on my server membership is like having rep on this... pritty much nothing... and so i needed help with someone helping me out on making members items and maybe members commands and place... Thanks .. i will give all credits to u for this and ill rep++ you
;)
Thanks !![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 12:29:49 pm[/size][hr]Yeah Yeah double post... HELP ME !!!
PLEASE !
Thanks :) !!
